dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: I'm sorry about earlier. I didn't know anything about that.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: The only one I know who can talk to The Creator is Gema.

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: It's alright. So, you have something to teach me?

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: Yes. I'll teach how to read the spells that the goblins use.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: They are using Hiragana characters. There are 46 basic hiragana syllables that we will teach you.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: Once you learned these, you can easily transcribe all of the sounds that the spells use and counter them!

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: Don't worry if you can't remember all of them right now. You could always check your Journal.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: Once you were taught how a syllable is read, that journal will magically learn it too.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: But a better way to memorize them is to train!

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: Go to the reading room so you can Train by yourself.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: After that, I will be willing to Practice with you!

dialog.name: You
dialog.message: I gotta say. That's a lot of things you told me.

dialog.name: Ryor
dialog.message: Don't worry. Once you get the hang of it, it will be a breeze.
